channel.title: Church Of Truth And Spirit (Online Church)
channel.description:
It's Not In A Building But In The Building Of The Body!
Welcome to the true Church which is you , your Spirit meeting with us in Spirit.
Ephesians 4:11 - says. To equip the saints for the purpose of ministry and send them out so they can do their part for the Body Of Christ.
We are all called and we will not hold you , after you have listened the segments we supply you in the land with certificate so you may go preach the Gospel and do the work of an Evangelist like Paul said in 2 Timothy.
You can come here or goto: www.citysidemusicministries.com/church_of_truth_and_spirit to participate.
On the site we will have some praise and worship music along with the sermon so you may choose what order you need to receive them as thus says the Lord. If you choose just to come for the sermon/lesson then this is the Spirit telling you.
We all are called to be leaders to spread the word and bring up others as we are brought under Christ Jesus and to prepare us for the New Jerusalem as Spirits this is why we peculiar creatures in this land.
We are not about money as some but not all are, the bible says God loves a cheerful giver and to give without being under compulsion. If you choose to give an offering this is up to you, Go to: www.citysidemusicministries.com/donations
Thank you for taking this short time to view our introduction and we welcome you as online church members to the true Body (In Spirit) of Christ.
God Blesses With Spiritual Love!
Minister Stevie Tee

item.title: WE ARE YOUNG - (Kid's Ministry) - FUN Feat. Janelle Monae (Stevie Tee Jr. & Curtis Michael)
item.description:
God, Minister Stevie Tee and CitySide Records brings to you: Stevie Tee Jr. & Curtis Michael a Christian Ministry that is children of the most high. "We Are Young" was recorded to let you know we all are God's children so we stay young in Jesus Christ.

SUPPORT OUR YOUTH MINISTRY BY TEXTING:

stevecurtis 1 to: 69937

Billed directly to your cell. (Donations are tax deductible)

item.title: Images And Liars
item.description:
Glory to God to all who are online subscribers/members of the Church Of Truth And Spirit.

We thank all you who have came from Asia to Africa from Alaska, Canada to the United States.

We are here to give you the word of God which in  we give you what many leaders won't give you. Minister Stevie Tee goes into depth abouth things you need to know that will help you overcome the enemy and avoid the mark of the beast.

This sermon here teaches you about having images of Jesus and Angels and how it is a sin and lie to have them on the internet, in your home, around your neck or teach it to your kids.

If you would like to contact Minister Stevie Tee you may email info@citysidemusicministries.com or call toll free 1-888-718-2551 ext 800.

Any love offerings or donations can be made at www.citysidemusicministries.com /donations

God Blesses To The World!

item.title: Captain Save A Saint Volume 1 No. 1 -Fornication & Patience
item.description:
DOWNLOAD YOUR BOOK COPY HERE TO READ ON YOUR COMPUTER!

 

Welcome online COTAS church members. The Church Of Truth And Spirit would like to first thank all the 4000 online church members for coming to listen and download the sermons which we were led by God to give. The word of God tells us to love God and to love thy neighbor. We love you by giving to you, God makes us prosperous by giving us the riches for his glory and it is our job to feed his sheep with those riches. So we are bringing this sermon to you in a way like non other. We will give you a short sermon on fornication and patience then we will give you a show that God called Captain Save A Saint that God gave us to give you. This is a cartoon show but is also in the form of book, eBook and DVD. The show is for adults and children and was put together by us but with the knowledge that God gave us. This show will have 100 books and sermons for you the saints of God can be fed from and we know this will inspire and motivate you to get saved and remain holy in the Lord. We ask that you repeat the prayer that Captain Save A Saint says with Minister Tyrone and Grandma Mosley so you may be cleansed as well. The actors in this short cartoon audio film is non other than Minister Stevie Tee playing all parts. So as he blesses you with this sermon/show we ask that you bless God by giving him praise for this. We ask that you click here to download the eBook to support this ministry financially and so that you may have this classic book of this show. Inside the book is the Holy Book Of COTAS which is a book of our online church members ministering to different individuals so you can see our book as we live this life that Jesus Christ told us to live. We thank you again and pray that you are your friends and family are fed from this sermon/cartoon audio show.

BUY THE E-BOOK GOTO:

item.title: JESUS SAW THE BEST IN ME feat. Marvin Sapp,Shekinah Glory Ministry & Prophetess Ertha Thompson
item.description:
Minister Stevie Tee records his fourth gospel music video. Song called Jesus Saw The Best In Me features Marvin Sapp,Shekinah Glory and his wife Prophetess Ertha Thompson was designed strictly for the streets to win new souls. Growing up not in Christ you see a lot and hear a lot of worldly music that clouds your mind with negativity, so Minister Stevie Tee was led to make a mixtape/cd that the non christians in the streets instrumentally can relate to but listen with christian lyrics. Minister Stevie Tee says informing the drug dealers, pimps, prostitutes and pushers know this is where he use to be having fun in the world that it was fun until you find out where it will lead you and that you can cause generational curses if you do not leave a true inheritance and thats to become rich in Christ Jesus and that will bring upon blessings to their kids and grandkids even their family today so that way they'll leave behind a legacy in Jesus Christ.

United States & Asia if you would like to make donations email send us an email to cityside2006@live.com with the amount you wish to donate.
item.dc:creator: STEVIE THOMPSON

item.title: STEP ON THE dEVILS HEAD VIDEO/SONG
item.description:
Minister Stevie Tee has done a video for the song Step On The devils Head for the CD A Million And 1 Souls Saved Volume 3. You may goto www.rhapsody.com/brothersteve or cdbaby.com/brothersteve2 to buy volumes 1 thru 3. So, Michael Jordan created for individuals who have been thru a lot and know the enemy been inbvading on your territory trying or taking things from you. A song for tiger woods and others who have been thru. This song is a motivator for you and it will sure make you dance.

CitySide Records/Ministries

  

CLICK HERE  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZLH6ftgzSJE TO WATCH VIDEO ON YOUTUBE!!!
item.dc:creator: STEVIE THOMPSON

item.title: LESSON 1 LOVE THY NIEGHBOR
item.description:
• THIS IS THE FIRST LESSON TO OBTAIN YOUR MINISTER/PREACHING LICENSE REMEMBER THERE WILL BE 10 SERMONS IN ALL AND AFTER YOU HAVE COMPLETED THEM ALL WE WILL TEST YOU AND YOU WILL RECIEVE YOUR LICENSE FOR FREE. YOU MAY CONTACT US IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS.

item.title: LESSON # 2 IS TITHING A SIN PART 1
item.description:
Welcome new Online Church members, This is lesson #2 for the saints who have been called to preach the Gospel. Again there will be 10 lessons now 8 remaining to get yours in the land. Remember God calls/ordains you and we just give you the piece of paper that the law of the land requires in order for you to marry and other things in your communities! There will be a second part to this lesson on tithing. Email us at cityside2006@yahoo.com to make donations/love offerings to our ministry, we will foward you a paypal invoice in the amount of the love offering of your choice.All saints who help out the Church Of Truth And spirit will also recieve free CD's of music and sermons monthly. Remember we are The Church Of Truth And Spirit
It's not in a building  - But in the building of the body of Christ!!
Foward this to 5 people that you love.


Minister Stevie Tee

850-224-4GOD (4463)

item.title: CHURCH OF TRUTH AND SPIRIT INTRODUCTION
item.description:
Church Of Truth And Spirit
  
Welcome to the COTAS or The Church Of Truth And Spirit which is not in a building but in the building of the body of Christ.
God tells us that Christ is coming back for a perfect church and he doesn't mean a building. Stephen in the bible said that the Spirit does not dwell in the stones/walls and the word tells us that your body is the temple where the Holy Ghost goes to dwell. So you and I are the church which Minister Stevie Tee says (T-H-U-G's) The Houses Under God!!
We teach you about the spiritual which is needed to make it to heaven. Giving you sound doctrine that some do not give because they are not there yet or at a lost such as tithing, the commandments, the true sabbath and what marriage truley is.
Come download our sermons and songs and get equipped with the knowledge that God has given you need to live according to Gods word so you can become a strong leader for God.

 

Online Church Members & Visitings if you wish you may:
GIVE AN OFFERING BY CLICKING HERE: http://citysidemusicministries.com/donations
item.dc:creator: STEVIE THOMPSON
